20101217000613.222|20101217000614.333|CCO|>> A FATHER HOLDING A TOY
20101217000614.333|20101217000615.444|CCO|GUN WAS SHOT AND KILLED
20101217000615.444|20101217000616.556|CCO|TODAY BY POLICE IN FRONT OF
20101217000616.556|20101217000617.667|CCO|HIS YOUNG SON AND PREGNANT
20101217000617.667|20101217000618.778|CCO|WIFE.

20101217000619.889|20101217000621.000|CCO|RESPONSIBLE TODAY A DOMESTIC
20101217000621.000|20101217000622.111|CCO|VIOLENCE CALL IN SANTA ANA
20101217000622.111|20101217000623.222|CCO|THIS MORNING.
20101217000623.222|20101217000624.333|CCO|THEY ARRIVED AND HEARD LOUD
20101217000624.333|20101217000625.444|CCO|ARGUING.
20101217000625.444|20101217000626.556|CCO|OFFICERS SAY THAT THE
20101217000626.556|20101217000627.667|CCO|SUSPECT HAD A GUN AND THEY
